item.title: Software development methodology
item.description: Scrumban In order to plan and keep track of the development process I will use the Scrumban methodology. This methodology gives me a lot of freedom regarding the conception of the individual features of »kopflos«. Instead of having to plan the entire features-set in advance, this method allows me to do so on-the-fly. Also, this method is not so strict regarding the timing of the implementation of the individual features. All I have to do is to plan iterations in which I commit to the implementation of a certain set of features.
